      • validateMemberData

        private Member validateMemberData​(java.lang.String fname,
                                  java.lang.String lname,
                                  java.lang.String birth,
                                  java.lang.String expire,
                                  java.lang.String location)
        It validates input data before creating member object Does date validation on date of birth/expiration date and location validation
        Parameters:
        fname - first name
        lname - last name
        birth - birthdate
        expire - expire date
        location - location
        Returns:
        Will return member if input is valid. Otherwise, it will return null

      • dateValidation

        private boolean dateValidation​(java.lang.String fname,
                               java.lang.String lname,
                               Date date,
                               Operation op)
        Does date validation on dob and expiration date Will print out error message if there is invalid date input
        Parameters:
        fname - first name
        lname - last name
        date - date
        op - operation
        Returns:
        if date is valid return true, otherwise return false

      • checkInValidate

        private boolean checkInValidate​(Member tempMem,
                                ClassType classType)
        check that the there is no conflict with other classes, member is not already checked in
        Parameters:
        tempMem - member object
        classType - class type
        Returns:
        boolean that shows whether member can check into class or not

      • addMember

        private void addMember​(java.util.Scanner sc)
        Adds member to gym database If adding is successful, prints out string notifying addition.
        Parameters:

      • removeMember

        private void removeMember​(java.util.Scanner sc)
        Remove the member from the gym database And prints the first name and last name to remove If the members is not the database, it prints the member is not in database
        Parameters:
        sc - scanner object that will read user inputs
